Header.title: Welcome to SweetMoss
Header.paragraph: A step in the right direction to your new lifestyle .... say goodbye to low energy mornigs and days riddled with brain fog and anxiety, and say hello to clarity

About.paragraph: Est in 2020 in the mist of the the Covid-19 pandemic our mission was to set out to bring awareness to health and a natural way to keep up with your health from the comfort of your your home. Sweetmoss is  a Black-Owned and family business that targets minorities from all over the world to stay health continuous and health positive

Services.name: Instagram
Services.text: Check us out on Instagram were we post everything related to seamoss like how to properly store it , the process behind making it,and fun facts on everything seamoss.

Features.title: Instagram
Features.text: Make sure to follow us on Instagram to keep up with everything SweetMoss related ....@sweetmoss__

Features.title: Located
Features.text: Sweetmoss is located and operated out of New York City.

Features.title: Podcast
Features.text: Make sure to check out the 'Thats Craaazy' Podcast on youtube  were we discuss topics ranging from health, passive incomes and every day topics just to name a few.
